Html:
Hi,

im trying to "overlay" a view (like a popup) and i've come  across ppl talking about the region popup, however im not exactly sure how to use it. in fact im not even sure that it is the right thing to use.

anybody care to explain to me please. i've checked the documentation and i dont find anything in there (unless i've missed it)

basic examples would be highly appreciated.

 

TIA

Hi Zaheer,

There is no documentation specific to the RegionPopupBehavior, as it is not part of the CAL. Instead it is located in the Behaviors folder, inside the StockTraderRI.Infrastructure project of the Reference Implementation. To check out an example of how it is being used you can check the following files:

  • Shell.xaml file of the StockTraderRI project, which is where the behavior is set-up.
  • NewsController.cs file inside the StockTraderRI.Modules.News project, which is where a view is added to the region.

Please let me know if this helps.

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman
